game.name: Veil Realm
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, Steam 도전 과제, 카메라 움직임 조정, 음량 개별 조정, 퀵타임 이벤트 없이 플레이 가능, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Veil Realm is a psychological horror with astral survival elements. Search for your missing son in an abandoned school, where reality twists into a nightmarish astral world. Face your fears, solve puzzles, and escape before you become part of the darkness.
